name: Echoes World
description: Adventurous maze style, puzzle game. Find your way out and help Echoes world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 64-bit quad core 1.6 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GT 640 or Radeon 6670 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
